bio: Anakin did not have a father, but was born into poverty. He was a good pod racer. He caught the eye of a passing Jedi2 and was trained, but was lured to the dark side. He married Padme but became Darth Vader before his twins were born, embracing evil.
Padme first encountered Anakin when he was a young boy. She was Queen of Naboo.

She married Anakin but decided that relationship wouldn't work when he choked her. She always wore a different outfit, especially when fighting large cats and political enemies. She gave birth to twins and died in childbirth.

Luke was raised by his uncle and aunt on a desert planet, not knowing he had a sister. When his aunt and uncle were killed, he flew off with an old man claiming to know the force. He rescued his sister, but didn't know she was his sister, and blew up the death star.

When he found out Darth Vader was his father, he lost his hand.  Eventually he saved his father, watching the emperor be killed in the process and restoring the balance to the Force.  Much later he tried training his sister's son, but that turned out badly.  Then he died.
Leia was raised as a princess with a life of privilege.  When she got the secret plans for the death star, she shared them with her only hope.
She was rescued by her brother, but fell in love with the rogueishly handsome Han Solo.
She watched Han be carbon frozen, then killed a large slug with only a chain.  Eventually she married Han.
They had a child, but he turned out to be whiney so they shipped him off to be trained as a Jedi by her brother.
Eventually Leia had to die because the actress who portrayed her died.
